comment.author: 19114153@N06
comment._content: No, that's a Douglas A-26 Invader.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives

comment.author: 69859130@N05
comment._content: This is one of the 25 A-26s with the 8 gun noses delivered to the 3rd BG while they were at San Jose, Mindoro P.I. in June 1945. This aircraft was assigned to the 89th Squadron. This crash happened at the Bolo Field on Okinawa after having its hydraulics shot out after a mission over Japan in August 1945
